title: Understanding and Applying Changes in Management Accounting in Networked Organizational Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Learners, as practicing professionals, analyze and apply real organizational cases in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment enabling collaboration and resource sharing

learning_goals: Describe the evolving patterns of management accounting systems in networked organizational structures
Design management accounting solutions applicable to real organizational cases using experiential learning approaches

Distinguish between accountability (Type 1) and problem-solving (Type 2) information based on the LMAS (Local Management Accounting System) concept, and propose decision-making processes for each type

resources: Collaboration Tools (Online Whiteboard, Document Sharing Platform)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
